QuestData.Title: Silkwing Cocoons
QuestData.Description: The silk from the cocoons of the silkwings are used for all manner of things in the village. We can never get enough, and we never have enough.$b$bIt is difficult to harvest the cocoons from the larva once they begin the process of metamorphosis.$b$bOur warriors are occupied with the assault on our village. If you could gather these for us, that would be helpful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Silkwing Cocoons from Silkwing Larva.$b$bKill the Larva quickly or they will turn into Silkwings, ruining their cocoons.
QuestData.CompletionText: A swift and sure hand is needed for the harvesting. I hope you will be successful.
QuestData.RewardText: Good quality cocoons, these. I can see you've gotten the hang of harvesting them.$B$BWe have experimented with trying to raise our own silkwing larva, but unfortunately the small ones do not produce enough silk to be of use to us.
